author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
description:
Provides average values of a group of objects.  Useful for camera tracking, AI flocking behaviors, and more.

Included expressions:

Center position (mean)
- X center position of a group of objects 
- Y center position of a group of objects

Center position (medium)
- X center position of a group of objects 
- Y center position of a group of objects 

Based on center of object:
- Minimum X position of a group of objects
- Maximum X position of a group of objects
- Minimum Y position of a group of objects
- Maximum Y position of a group of objects

Based on AABB of object:
- Minimum X position of a group of objects
- Maximum X position of a group of objects
- Minimum Y position of a group of objects
- Maximum Y position of a group of objects

- Average horizontal force (X) of a group of objects
- Average vertical force (Y) of a group of objects
name: AverageValuesOfObjects
shortDescription: Average values of multiple objects (including position and velocity)

eventsFunctions.description: Minimum X position of a group of objects (using AABB of object)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Minimum X position of a group of objects (using AABB of object)
eventsFunctions.name: GroupMinX_AABB

events.comment: Initialize with a value from an object (to prevent 0 from being used)

parameters.longDescription: Objects that will be used to calculate the value
